content:
RegisteredTaskObjectLifetime Enum

Definition

Defines the lifetime of a registered task object.

In this Article

public enum RegisteredTaskObjectLifetime
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
RegisteredTaskObjectLifetime

Fields

AppDomain

The registered object will be disposed when the AppDomain in which the build was launched is unloaded
Build

The registered object will be disposed when the build ends.
